name: Scary Choo Horror Escape Game
description:
A horrifying evil has escaped from the mansion and is now spreading uncontrollably throughout the horror metropolis.Because it's easy to become disoriented in this terrifying metropolis, we'll need to figure out how to establish a new life for ourselves here while also protecting us from the evil that lurks around every corner.
Our mission is to locate a key and food in order to live.


Game Features:
- Horror sound effects
- Smooth gameplay control
- Find key from evil house
- Trilling and scary levels
